definition: common mallow (Malva sinesis)/variant of 蕎|荞[qiao2]

sentences.english: The young couple settled down in the Soba restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的夫妇把家安在了荞麦面馆里。

sentences.english: Study on extraction conditions of flavonoids from skin powder of tartary buckwheat;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究苦荞麦叶中总黄酮类物质的乙醇提取工艺。

sentences.english: But Grandpa did not want to work at Soba restaurant anymore.
sentences.chinese: 不过老爷爷不想再在荞麦面馆工作了。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Hull Pillows are good for back, side and stomach sleepers.
sentences.chinese: 荞麦壳枕头可治疗背部和腹部一边熟睡。

sentences.english: Objective The extraction technology of total flavones in Fagopyrum tataricum leaves was studied with ethanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究苦荞麦叶中总黄酮类物质的乙醇提取工艺。

sentences.english: Buckwheat leaned backwards much more arrogantly than before.
sentences.chinese: 荞麦往后挺了挺身子，比以前更加傲慢了。

sentences.english: Put the seaweed on top of the soba and serve with dip.
sentences.chinese: 在荞麦面上洒上海带及配以调味料伴食。

sentences.english: When the proportion was higher than 30%, values about mixed flour paste flatly changed.
sentences.chinese: 荞麦粉比例大于30%，混粉评价值变化平缓。

sentences.english: Buckwheat have abundant nutritional value and powerful health care function.
sentences.chinese: 苦荞麦具有丰富的营养价值和保健功能。

sentences.english: Pillows can be brought into Canana, I recalled.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢荞麦皮枕头可以带进多伦多吗？

sentences.english: The damp and hot buckwheat is the intermediate product in the processing of producing parboiled buckwheat.
sentences.chinese: 湿热荞麦是生产蒸荞麦米的中间产品。

sentences.english: The damp and hot buckwheat is the intermediate product in the processing of producing parboiled buckwheat.
sentences.chinese: 湿热荞麦是生产蒸荞麦米的中间产品。

sentences.english: The extraction conditions and properties of pigment from tartary buckwheat shell were studied in detail.
sentences.chinese: 对苦荞麦壳色素提取条件及性质进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: For noodles, I used earthy buckwheat soba.
sentences.chinese: 面条用的是质朴的荞麦面。

sentences.english: Meg was already covering the buckwheats, and piling the bread into one big plate.
sentences.chinese: 梅格已动手把荞麦盖上，把面包堆放到一个大盘子里。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
